title: NA
review: ive been on the hunt for the ideal pair of gym shorts and ive finally found them with these womens gym shorts these shorts have become an essential part of my workout wardrobe and i cant say enough good things about themfirst and foremost these shorts are incredibly comfortable the fabric is soft and stretchy which makes them perfect for all types of workouts from intense hiit sessions to yoga and everything in between they move with me allowing for a full range of motion without any restrictionsone of the standout features for me is the moisturewicking technology i tend to work up a sweat during my workouts and these shorts do an excellent job of keeping me dry and comfortable i never have to worry about feeling sticky or uncomfortable no matter how intense my workout getsthe fit is just right these shorts are snug enough to stay in place during runs and squats but not so tight that they feel constricting the waistband is comfortable and doesnt dig in which is a huge plus plus they come in various lengths and styles so you can find the perfect fit for your body type and personal preferencei also appreciate the stylish design these shorts look great both in the gym and for casual wear the color options are trendy and the quality is evident even after several washes they still look as good as newthe durability of these shorts is impressive they have held up well to frequent wear and washing showing no signs of wear and tear this longevity is a testament to their qualityin summary these womens gym shorts are a fantastic addition to any workout wardrobe they strike the perfect balance between comfort performance and style i highly recommend them to anyone looking for shorts that can keep up with their active lifestyle these shorts have truly become a gamechanger in my fitness routine

review: ive tried a few different aurola shorts and the dream collection is by far my favorite the material is so soft and comfortable i found them to be squatproof on me with a nude thong  they make the booty pop also this lilac color is an exact dupe for the alphalete digital violet i had both and ended up returning my alphalete because i like the material on these shorts better

prod_name: aurola
title: awesome shorts
review: these are my favorite shorts that i own for leg workouts they are very flattering and the quality is top notch i have a lovehate relationship with butt scrunch leggings what i like about them is the practical aspect this is going to sound weird lol but its like each butt cheek is separately secured so when you do squats it doesnt feel like there is near as much stress being placed on the centerback seam of the material that goes over your butt this also means that the material itself stretches less meaning less chance of the material being seethroughi do not like butt scrunch leggings for the showing off your butt idea i dont want that kind of attention when i go to the gym this is precisely why i like these shorts as much as i do they have the most discreet butt scrunch that i have tried enough to be practical and a little flattering without giving off look at me vibes i would still only buy them in black or a very dark color like navy because the lighterbrighter colors would still have more of a showoff effect than what i am comfortable withsome people are complaining about the length of the shorts yes i agree that they are definitely longer than the picture makes them look but i personally way prefer the biker short length no rolling up or having to adjust anything midexercise

title: not for thicc girls
review: i wanted to love these sooo much i like the feel of the fabric and it does give the glutes a nice lift but the band has a ton of compression and the main part of the bottom really doesnt so it gave me some crazy hip dips i have small dips but theyre usually not noticeable in most shorts and these just drew attention to them in the worst way the uneven compression just caused everything to roll out of place as soon as i started moving after  squat the shorts had given me so many new stomach rolls i could have opened a bakery if you dont have much to compress theyll probably be fine if youre curvymuscular you might look for something with more even compression all around returning these and trying the power version to see if those have better structure than the dream ones

prod_name: crz yoga women's pima cotton workout crop top short sleeve running t-shirt casual athletic tee
title: love it
review: so if youre anything like me you hate returning things especially if you bought something online that is why im writing this review i hope it can help someone so i am  lbs bust is  i got a medium and im so glad i did i was debating on getting the large because on the size chart it said that a size  bust would fit better with a large but this is not true i do not believe that this chart is accurate it fit well and was not tight or baggy at all ive seen a lot of other reviewers complain about how this shirt is too short so i was initially very nervous to order because of this i found that this shirt can be as short as you want it to be if you wear high waisted leggings no skin will be shown if you wear low waisted leggingspants your stomach will show but it is not excessive it is just like a regular crop top and it definitely goes past your bra i saw a reviewer say that the top wouldnt go past her bra unless you are exceptionally tall this shouldnt be an issue also if you lift your arms up to the ceiling this shirt will rise up but that is to be expected this is a crop top this is a great top to wear to the gym and holds sweat very well im overall very pleased with it and this product has exceeded my expectationsnote if you are inbetween sizes stick with your normal size if you want a tighter fit size down if you want a larger fit size up

prod_name: anrabess women 2 piece outfits sweatsuit set 2023 fall oversized half zip sweatshirt wide leg sweatpant lounge set tracksuit
title: cozy affordable comfort
review: i recently purchased this piece set and i couldnt be happier with my purchase  the set consists a convenient  zip top and comfortable bottoms featuring an elastic waist and a drawstring  i must admit the drawstring is more decorative than functional  the wide leg of the pants is just rightnot overly exaggerated but wide enough to provide a stylish and relaxed lookone of the amazing features is the softness of the fabric ive washed this set three times already and it still looks and feels as great as it did when i first got it the color hasnt faded and theres been no pilling or loss of softnessbeing  and  pounds i opted for a medium and it fits me perfectly the only minor issue i encountered was that the pants were a tad long for my liking however a quick fix with hem tape resolved the problem and now theyre just right  i initially purchased the navy blue set and was so impressed that i bought the apricot color a week later im pleased to report that both colors are true to whats shown online  the outfit is incredibly soft and in my opinion its an excellent dupe for highend brands

review: i own several items in the spanx air essentials items this was going viral as being a great dupe and i kept seeing ads for the price i figured id try it since i love my aein terms of look a near perfect duplication fabric feel is about same weight it is very smooth but doesnt feel quite as luxurious to me  sizingfit is interesting the top feels gigantic for most part and the sleeves outrageously long well past my finger tips but the waist band feels tight and with less stretch the matching pants are snug the ae are ordered as separates and i probably would have sized up in the pants they fit but the look isnt super flattering due to the snugness particularly in the color i gotspeaking of that was one of the things i loved was the color choices the pink i got is definitely lovely i might personally stick with the ae which i have affordability for but for those looking to save a buck this is a decent alternative

title: go get them before they sell out
review: first of all i have tried  pairs of shorts from amazon not really but it feels like itmy legs are by far the area i am most self conscious about so im very particular i wanted to love the bmjl shorts that has so many reviews but alas it was not meant to be they are comfy but i didnt love them i would be settling the medium fit my thighs but pinched the muffin the large fit nicely on my hips but the thigh holes were so big it added bulkinessif theres one thing i do not need its bulkinessenter crz yoga i have several of their leggings and they are amazing i also have several sports bras and tank tops that i have had for years and they are still in pretty good shape thats impressive since i workout  days a week i have tried their shorts before  in inseam and they were good but the material was heavy does that make sense and i didnt know that until i tried these also the large in the older version was a tad bigger but these fit like a dream no muffin thigh holes are perfect my thighs are  in around at the largest part the material is lightweight and quick drying these are  in inseam but i also have the  in inseam and you can hardly tell the difference i like both a lot my only complaint is they go fast even on their websitelet me summarize this way i got a color other than black or navy thats a huge win for me iykyk

title: love these need bigger pocket
review: these are almost perfect they are just the right height on my hips right below my belly buttonthe length is perfect im  and dont like really short shorts because i have this permanent hematoma on my upper outer thigh that im self conscious of and also dont like it when short athletic shorts look like underwear when you sit down because they ride up these still ride up when sitting but not nearly as much as othersthe stretch is perfect enough to suck my tummy in some but not enough to feel uncomfortable on my abdomen i have chronic gi pain thats exacerbated by too tight of clothing these dont cause me issues the built in undies fit almost perfectly sometimes the built ins are too small and cut into me but these are greatmy only con is the pocket i bought these shorts mainly because it has a pocket i bought a pair of athletic shorts years ago with pockets and now i can never go back to no pockets the  pocket on these does not fit my iphone  i can stuff it in there but  of the phone sticks out so you definitely wouldnt be able to run with your phone in there its good for keys and a small travel pill container if the pocket was slightly bigger then these would be a overall these may be my favorite or in the top  favorite gym shorts that i own i will probably buy more colors unless i can find others with better pockets for now though i think these are the best option out thereim  and  lbs hourglass figure not an athletic build with medium sized booty wide hips and larger thighs and i got a medium

prod_name: the gym people womens high waisted running shorts quick dry athletic workout shorts with mesh liner zipper pockets
title: awesome and secure a great dupe
review: detailed review ahead girl be ready for a noveli have to say first that i am a die hard lululemon fan but i work as a choreographer every summer for a well respected theatre camp last year all my lululemon running shorts and most of my tanks were on their last leg i had heard about these online and wanted to give them a try as an alternative for summer camp as i could spend less and buy more colors to mix and match wow for the money you cant go wrongi purchased the white black denim blue and jade green tanks and the matching mesh lined high waist running shorts i am  and your typical smedium dd i ordered medium across the board i rapidly lose weight over the summer due to the heat and the exercise i feel these will fit me if i fluctuate as low as about  pounds lightertanks these are fantastic they are not for super high impact but for lower medium impact dance they are great i can also see myself wearing these all summer as loungewear or with shorts if i sized down it wouldve given me more cleavage than i wanted  i may try taking in the liner a bit for more security near the end of summer when ive dropped weight great lululemon dupe comfortable and flattering the only con i have is that the size varied slightly by color the black and white fit more snug which i preferred the denim blue and jade green fit a little looser as you can see in the side profile picture of the denim blue setshorts these are great dupes as well the back pocket completely fits my iphone xr the side pocket is super secure and deep the shorts are slightly longer in the back the high waist is pretty small and includes about an inch of tighter elastic i personally like this for camp so my walkie doesnt pull them down but if you have more of a square figure it may pay to size up the tank meets right where these shorts start my only complaint on these is sometimes the way they lay can look a bit funky in the crotch area but nothing too major the colors all looked great i wore the white with red underwear and it didnt show through where the mesh liner wasas a set black is perfect and what youd expect the white is a crisp white like it made me pull out my teeth whitener white its beautiful but literally my snow white opi nail polish even looked a tad dingy in comparison the jade green shorts were a slightly different shade than the tank it was not enough for my husband to notice without telling him for some reason it looks a lot different in the photo but theyre more similar in person the blue is a pretty darn close match if anything the band is slightly different due to the different material its not a dealbreaker for me as i plan to mix and match a lotfinal thoughts i love them i sent both my sisters the links to them i will live in them all summer and i will be buying more sets in a variety of colors lululemon who

prod_name: the gym people womens high waisted running shorts quick dry athletic workout shorts with mesh liner zipper pockets
title: i ordered a second pair the first day i wore these
review: i bought these shorts for running i got tired of my bike shorts riding up into unmentionable places while running and hiking pros super comfortable  pockets that work for keys and phone the larger back pocket zips to keep your phone snug and safe on point sizing stays exactly where they start with nice loose legs for freedom of movement which brings me to my first concons not a huge fan of the mesh attached underwear due to that i cut the mesh undies out and found out that minus them they do ride up a bit they still give you decent coverage but they didnt stay in place as much without them i had to tug them down a few times over my  mile run so if you dont like the mesh briefs just know that cutting them out means they dont stay out the same way also the ruffle below the back waistband is a bit weird it looks really flattering if you are wearing a crop or belly button length tank its not bulky under a longer or looser shirt butwhy i dont really get the concept i do miss side pockets a bit in these but there is pockets available for the necessities so that might be picky on my partoverall i ordered more the first day i wore them because they are cute and comfy i got a ton of compliments and pointed a fellow yoga lover to them because the matching mesh briefs mean all the cheeks and bits stay decent even during a handstand totally worth the price

prod_name: the gym people womens high waisted running shorts quick dry athletic workout shorts with mesh liner zipper pockets
title: the liner is looser and these are short
review: i am  lbs generally a large bottom got these in medium wine red based on reviews and intending to wear them high waisted they do feel a bit tight around my waist in and they are short worn like this i cannot imagine a taller person or long legs worn highwaisted these have about a in inseam and it rolls up sometimes when ive been active a while which is really annoyingthe back pocket is roomy for my phone samsung s to have a snug fit and doesnt feel like it flops around when im active the front pocket is on the left side and suitable for a house key or room card or lip balm or something smallthe mesh is light and these are light wicking the liner is loose like quite loose if i had a large i would have been swimming in it so not great if you dont want to wear undies with thesethe fabric is a sporty lightweight fabric as expected and food for watersport as well as an alternative to swim bottoms if they get wet red wine color its noticeable from sweat or other liquids the waist band is a softer stretch fabric and feels nice against the skin and nonchafingthese are very well made and high quality shorts the color is a true wine red and very pretty

review: bought these on prime day compared to other notable athletic brands i think these are high quality for the price the pictures arent great to show the fit but i wanted to show how vibrant the pink is i loooove the color i bought two different pairs both pink but different shades of pink this is the bright pink color the other pair was rose red as some have mentioned the waistband is pretty tight fitting i dont mind it but when im just wearing the shorts and my sports bra it definitely cinches in at my waist with just the slightest bit of skin bulging over the worlds tiniest muffin top it doesnt bother me enough to not wear them the other thing that makes the fit a little weird is that while the waist is tight the built in briefs are pretty dang loose and i am not a pancake booty i have some buns and the briefs are loose on me it causes the material where the shorts meet the waistband to give just a little puff thats not the most flattering id rather it lay flatter than poofing out anyway this could all be different with one size up im  lbs and bought size small maybe a medium would eliminate the issues but cest la vie buy them

review: i loved these so much i had to write a review  i first purchased the pink shorts pictured above in medium because some reviewers said that these shorts ran small and since i wouldnt have time to exchange before an upcoming race i couldnt take a chance on them being too small  they were a little billowy but i kept them and loved the back pocket which held my phone securely and the front pocket is great for a hotel key card or credit card  i have washed and dried them and they seem very well made  so i had to get another pair  this time i got a size small which is what i usually wear in most brands  i also got a matching top in medium because i dont like to feel constricted  i am  and  pounds and athletic build  i hope this helps people determine their size  the top is also well made and the perfect length for me  at  years old i kind of like my crop tops a little longer

prod_name: champion women's
title: good fit comfy and colorful

prod_name: champion women's
title: love them

title: it fit but its a little cheap compared to others
review: i needed several longsleeve white tshirts so i bought this shirt and a similar longsleeve white tshirt from cadmus here on amazon i wear a lot of hanes products for casual wear but the cadmus looked good too so i bought one of each at the time they were both about  however i was really disappointed in the hanes shirtthis shirt was lightthin and felt cheap probably due to its fabric this shirt is  polyester while other athletic shirts are composed of polyester and spandex without spandex this shirt doesnt move or flex as easily also spandex gives fabric a smoother silkier and thickerheavier feel that this shirt lacksalthough it says its for athletics i feel like the cut and fit of this shirt are more fashionoriented however even for that i did not keep the shirt because it didnt look nearly as good on me as the cadmus shirti notice that the price on this shirt has now dropped to  but i think even at that price i probably wouldnt have kept the shirt

title: runs way too small
review: perfect short for workout or just hanging out im middle aged and love the length and shape of this short i purchased this short for my twenty year old daughter and she loves the length and shape as much as i do the pocket has ample room to put your phone in as well as keys etc  i like that it zips up so you dont have to worry about your stuff falling out while youre working out the fabric of the short is slightly stretchy and very breathable the builtin underwear are wonderful because they keep the short from riding up or moving around while you exercise they are very comfortable too the high waist is figure flattering and very comfortable the short is a very good quality and i would absolutely buy another pair

title: love these

prod_name: bmjl women's athletic shorts high waisted running shorts pocket sporty shorts gym elastic workout shorts
title: run small
review: i recently purchased these pink athletic shorts and i am absolutely in love with them they are the perfect combination of comfort and style and i cant recommend them enoughfirstly i have to mention how comfortable these shorts are they are made from a lightweight and breathable fabric that is perfect for running and other athletic activities they move with my body and dont feel restrictive or tight which is essential for me when im trying to stay activebut the best part is how cute they look the pink color is vibrant and fun and the design is sleek and flattering ive received so many compliments on these shorts and they make me feel confident and stylish even when im working outive worn these shorts on multiple runs now and they have held up incredibly well they dont ride up or chafe and they stay in place throughout my entire workout plus they have a convenient pocket thats perfect for storing my phone or keysoverall i can confidently say that these pink athletic shorts are the perfect addition to any active wardrobe they are comfortable stylish and great for running or other workouts if youre looking for a new pair of shorts that will make you look and feel great then look no further

title: love
review: im usually pretty hesitant to buy shorts online because theyre either too small too short too sheer or too low waisted these shorts are absolutely perfectim  about  waist and typically a  in bottoms i ordered an xl just to be safe and i definitely think that was the right choice any smaller wouldve been too tight for my likingthe material is thin and light but doesnt look cheap i love how theyre slightly longer in the back and curve up on the sides the waistband really snatches you in without being uncomfortable or restricting the liner inside is also thin but softer than the material of the shorts so if you wanted to go natural youd be cozythere is one zip pocket on the left side and it fits my iphone xr perfectly with a little extra room i absolutely love these and im definitely buying in every color

prod_name: bmjl women's athletic shorts high waisted running shorts pocket sporty shorts gym elastic workout shorts

title: good for sports
review: i bought the shorts for my dance practices i personally dont love tight shorts on me so i usually look for looser ones problem with looser ones is that they dont always provide the most coverage especially for a dancer luckily these shorts have built in underwear and it had good coverage i also really appreciate the coverage on the shorts its not to small the i feel uncomfortable but its not to long that it looks bad the pocket is also really nice theres only one but the zipper helps make sure nothing falls out and it fit my phone

prod_name: bmjl women's athletic shorts high waisted running shorts pocket sporty shorts gym elastic workout shorts
title: not too bad
review: i can understand if my review title isnt convincing but ill explain im someone who reads a lot of reviews before i commit and there were some mixed ones on this item i wanted a pair of athletic shorts that didnt cost me  and were highwaisted so i tried these the material is lightweight moisturewicking and has decent stretch in it i personally love the seat coverage of the builtin brief too often shorts with a brief liner ride up when you move and these cover like a fullcoverage bottom so no wedgie worry win some reviews said the back was too long  i disagree i have longer legs than torso and a rounder bottom so i loved the back length where im a little bummed the shorts do ride up in the front and they will if you have a more quaddominant leg because theyre a nice longer length with a more flat front to be more flattering no doubt theres nowhere else for the fabric to go once you start moving and walking if i wanted to wear these shorts for a casual athleisure outfit the ride wouldbother me because id have to keep pulling them down since i plan to work out in them run play volleyball i guess i wont have to tug them up in front i am  lbs and i ordered a medium based on the size chart measurements i feel this is the most appropriate size as a l would have been too balloony so overall theyre not too bad i will probably get other pairs to rotate just wish that the front didnt pooch out as much

title: love these
review: i dont usually write reviews  ive tried a ton of amazon workout gear and honestly hadnt been impressed until i found these shorts im   lbs usually a s in shortsbottoms and i sized up to a m hoping the liner wouldnt dig in when i run its so insanely comfortable the liner is more of a brief fit and is the softest material thats the only main concern ive ever had with lululemon nike etc my only complaints with these shorts are that the material of the actual short part are super thin paper like it feels sweat wicking but i could still see sweat marks on them the band is also super thick and is also made of that same sweat wicking material so it isnt the most comfortable for long runs had the band been made of the liner material these would be the holy grail pockets are also deep enough for iphone  case and still room in the pocket with zipper zipped

title: comfortable and looks great
review: i love these workout shorts ive been looking for a set of workout shorts for a while that werent bike shorts and dont ride up the butt and these for the bill i love the modern style of the high and thick waistband too im in my s and love the look of cropped loose work out tanks but dont want to show my stomach since these have a high waist i can wear crop tops without showing my stomach and the thick waistband makes it look so cute ive walked  miles in them and used them for barre classes and they feel great the material dries fast and even though they come very wrinkled just give them a steam and theyre good to go while wearing i dont find they wrinkle easy either i bought so many colors i got my typical size in bottoms medium ive got a big butt and muscular thighs i tried the large on and they fit but are too big love them

review: i needed several longsleeve white tshirts so i bought this shirt and a similar longsleeve white tshirt from cadmus here on amazon i wear a lot of hanes products for casual wear but the cadmus looked good too so i bought one of each at the time they were both about  however i was really disappointed in the hanes shirtthis shirt was lightthin and felt cheap probably due to its fabric this shirt is  polyester while other athletic shirts are composed of polyester and spandex without spandex this shirt doesnt move or flex as easily also spandex gives fabric a smoother silkier and thickerheavier feel that this shirt lacksalthough it says its for athletics i feel like the cut and fit of this shirt are more fashionoriented however even for that i did not keep the shirt because it didnt look nearly as good on me as the cadmus shirti notice that the price on this shirt has now dropped to  but i think even at that price i probably wouldnt have kept the shirt

title: comfort and protection in one stylish package
review: i bought the bassdash womens upf  tshirt for a hiking trip and its been a wonderful addition to my outdoor wardrobe the upf  rating is what initially drew me to this shirt and it didnt disappoint it provided excellent protection from the sun without having to constantly reapply sunscreen especially in hardtoreach areasthe material is lightweight and breathable which is a huge plus for outdoor activities despite its long sleeves i didnt feel overheated even under direct sunlight the moisturewicking property of the fabric kept me dry and comfortable throughout my hikeswhat i also love about this shirt is its versatility its not just for hiking ive worn it for fishing trips and casual outdoor outings and it fits in perfectly in each setting the fit is flattering yet not restrictive offering a good balance between comfort and stylethe durability of the shirt after several washes is impressive it has retained its shape color and most importantly its sun protection capabilityin terms of design its a nice break from the typical rugged outdoor wear the shirt comes in various colors providing options for those who like to add a bit of style to their outdoor gearin conclusion the bassdash womens upf  uv sun protection tshirt is an excellent choice for anyone looking for a functional comfortable and stylish piece of outdoor clothing whether youre into hiking fishing or just need a good sunprotective shirt for everyday use this one ticks all the boxes highly recommended

prod_name: hanes sport women's short sleeve cool dri performance tee
title: good undershirt for scrubs not as good wear alone shirt
review: i have ordered these shirts  different times over the past  years both black and white all same size each time something different has arrived initially tagless but second two orders arrived with tags size of neck circumference different each time initially great fit and comfort second order neck smaller and fit higher uptighter third order loose and sloppy around the neck the overall fit of these shirts are pretty boxy and unflattering in my opinion i wouldnt wear them as just a shirt they are however pretty good as an undershirt especially for under scrubs which is what i use them for they are moisture wick comfortable and my scrubs slide easily with the material no sticking or static inexpensive enough to replace easily when the white turns discolored from wear i will continue to buy solely to use as an undershirt

prod_name: hanes sport women's short sleeve cool dri performance tee
title: perfect for work
review: im a police officer and i wear these as undershirts for my uniform shirt theyre perfect fit is true to size for a nice relaxed fit that isnt too baggy length is adequate for staying tucked in tag is easily removable so it doesnt scratch my neck and so far there is no color fade or pillingstretching they help with keeping cool in the summer under shirt and vest and help prevent heat rash also even though they are moisture wicking they dont seem to hang on to odor great value for the price i bought several packs for reference im   lbs d usually an xs or s shirt

prod_name: hanes sport women's short sleeve cool dri performance tee

prod_name: hanes sport women's short sleeve cool dri performance tee
title: i ordered a medium and it fit perfect not tight to my skin
review: i ordered one for my indoor soccer games and i received it in the mail a few days ago i am  and about lbs with a muscularathletic type build i ordered a medium and it fit perfect not tight to my skin but not too loose either also the material feels like an under armor shirt so if you are looking for that typical cotton tee then you may not like this overall great for the price and ill definitely be purchasing more for the gym

prod_name: hanes sport women's short sleeve cool dri performance tee
title: quality has gone downhill
review: swap the first and second pictures around because for some reason amazon added my pictures in the wrong order when i submitted this review i have purchased this shirt  times first picture is from  second picture is from  and third picture is from july  the first shirt was perfect it fit right was actually tagless like the picture shows in the listing and the quality was good the second shirt was okay the fit was fine not tagless anymore and the quality was starting to decline as you can see in the second picture its starting to get less opaque the third and most recent shirt looks awful the fit in the chest is tighter as well as the sleeves and the neck is wider again its not tagless anymore and the quality is abysmal its practically see through i wouldnt even risk buying any of the lighter colored shirts in the last picture you can see the differences in color and fit you can clearly see the third shirt is narrower at the chest boxier looking and has a wider neck i regret not purchasing more in  now ill be returning my most recent purchase because the quality just isnt the same anymore

prod_name: hanes sport women's short sleeve cool dri performance tee
title: look for a better shirt
review: just a shortened mens shirt the fabric in unpleasant to skin a simple boxy rectangular cut no bust darts no waist fitting the sleeve is too short to offer proper protection the description says upfuv protection but it is nowhere found on the shirt or the tags or labels does not wicks the moisture well and is not breathable enough for the active use wish i didnt cut the tags on both shirts that i ordered and could return at least the second one the only good thing about it that the scoop neck is relatively close to the neck and does not expose much the back or the chest i couldnt make myself to put the shirt on for the third time after dealing with it during the first two workoutssadly the shirts had to go in the garbage

prod_name: hanes sport women's short sleeve cool dri performance tee
title: polyester shirts a little stretchy wash and dry no special instructions
review: i bought two of these shirts an xl light blue and later a l navy following the size chart i ordered the xl it fits loosely the neck is high up as shown in the model but because of the thin material and the light color i didnt think this shirt was the most flattering its fine dont get me wrong  it isnt the fault of the shirt that any pants or wigglejiggles are extra visible with the light blue color it is still fine for working out or for around the house this also stains easilyi then ordered a darker navy in l this one is form fitting and because it is darker the muffin top is less noticeable and in my opinion more flattering for hourglass figuresthe material  polyester does well in the washer and dryer  very few wrinkles both shirts are nicely constructed in and out it says made in jordan this shirt is especially good for travel when you need to pack light as this shirt can be washed and dried overnight and does not wrinkle it is easy casual wear over jeans or leggingsanother hanes shirt i really like that are  cotton with a more feminine fit is the  hanes womens nanot vneck tshirt ldeep forest

prod_name: hanes sport women's short sleeve cool dri performance tee
title: good tee fit and true to size for a busty person
review: i wasnt sure about the size since mine fluctuates and im currently on the large end i wanted wicking shirts that fit like my favorite tee with just a little bit of draping i prefer to buy once cry once with merino wool and do have some of those tees but theyre always cut for a certain athletic build either very narrow for the mens and i have to size up and have giant sleeves or they just dont come in my size in womens i got this hanes shirt in a x and worried it would run small but it is perfect and very comfortable and cool i hate sweaty cotton clinging to me and these will be a nice swap out with my basic tees for summer days when im outside on dog walks etc i plan to get one a size down for a beach trip as a swim shirt and rash guard  for boogie boarding under that brutal atlantic sun

review: i love how comfortable these shorts are im on the taller side and the length is perfect since i prefer my shorts not to creep up too high i ended up purchasing  pairs and theyve been my go to shorts all summer the pockets are roomy which i think is a big plus since womens shorts and pants often have tiny pockets theyre pretty casual as far as the material is concerned but i actually dressed them up a little more with a nicer top and some cute sandals overall im very happy with these shorts and hope they eventually make them in a wider array of colors

review: i cant complain about the quality they are well made re seams and stitching  i like the weight of the material its not flimsy or seethrough i even like the fit at the waist and tummyim  and find the length to just right mid thighbut the shorts are high on the scratchy scale even after a wash with fabric softener and low on the stretchy scale  they also do that old school nonstretch jeans thing  where they stretch in weird ways and get misshapenim not in love but they will do for working around the house they wont be my goto comfyaftershower shorts

prod_name: hanes women's jersey short
title: great everyday mom shorts
review: i bought  pair in different colors for everyday wear of mom life and i love them i wear x in most bottoms so thats what i ordered and these run very true to size they have elastic and a drawstring so if youre having a bloated day you can loosen them and if you are feeling thin after a day of sweating away pounds mowing your lawn in the summer heat you can cinch em up theyre not too thick not too thin they wash well and theyre super comfy i live in shorts and tanks all summer and these are great for quick walks grocery shopping or scrubbing your toiletwhatever the day throws at you i dont expect them to last for years and years but at this price point they dont need to i plan to order more before the winter hits in case they dont carry them next summer

prod_name: hanes women's jersey short

review: these fit great and are comfortable i am   and weigh  the waist has  or  inches stretch as long as you untie the cute little bow and retie it loosely so if i can lose more weight i will still be able to wear them by tightening the strap and the price is definitely a bonus

prod_name: hanes women's jersey short
title: not into lycra work out shorts
review: for those of you like me that are not into lycra bike type shorts for working out these fit the bill  they are a flattering inseam length with a straight not tapered leg shape  they have an thick elastic waist band with and additional drawstring if needed  i purchase the black and the navy and both have laundered well using cold water wash and medium dry settings

prod_name: hanes women's jersey short
title: they actually fit
review: i have tried several brands of shorts and i have had no success until now thank you haynes for taking size as it should be these are comfortable true to size they do have a drawstring but they have two nice pockets the pockets could lay a little flatter but overall ill be buying some more of these great buy great price great shorts if youre not looking for something super dressy that you can just throw on for summer and they wont hold the heat or the sweat

review: i had a shirt like this from a popular fast fashion store  lost it on a vacation i wore the style often so took to amazon to try to find a replacement i ordered the black color in size medium i love love love this shirt  its much nicer than the shirt i bought it to replace its super soft  the fabric has a nice midweight that feels like goodquality workoutlounge pieces from much more expensive stores its slightly slinky  stretchy but drapes flatteringly i much prefer it to the original shirt i lost  will order it in more colorsi am   lbs size b bra athletic build im usually in between a small  a medium in most popular store sizes i would say the medium for this shirt runs on the larger side of medium if i wanted a tighter fit i would size down to a small but i personally like the looser drapey fit of the medium the sleeves are generously long  have nice comfortable fitting thumb holes the length of the shirt is nice as well i have a long torso  it looks good sitting higher on my waist with jeans and lower with leggings after wearing the shirt all day i havent noticed any snagging or pilling i paired it with a strappy back sports bra  wore it to a yoga class  then afterwards to get a drink with a friend she complimented my new purchase  was amazed when i told her where i got it  for how much

title: very weird fit not meant for lounging or working out
review: i really wanted to like this shirt it has the open back and the thumb hole and isnt the worst material the fit is absolutely terrible though the sleeves from the thumb are way too long it covers my pinky finger entirely im on the shorter side have pretty long fingers and like a long sleeve but this at least an inch or two longer than any other shirt of this kindthe stitching in the shoulder is in a weird spot as well and it pulls down at the armpit most tops of this type have a looser feel but this shirt acts like its supposed to be fitted for someone with a much larger shouldertheres also a pretty substantial wasteband on the back of the shirt for what reason backless shirts are usually comfortable and drapey i like to throw them over sweatpants or dress them up with a cute little skirt and heels but neither of those scenarios warrants a  inch thick hard piece of waistband on the back half of the shirti tried to figure out if i could shorten the sleeves fix the shoulder and remove the waistband that should have never been inserted into a shirt and just gave up and returned it the idea is great but there are too many things wrong with the fit it might work for a much taller person but then id be worried that the draping wouldnt work with the giant unecessary waistband which might be more or an athletic fit and good for the gym but you arent doing anything practical with your fingers getting stuck in the way too long sleeves

prod_name: c9 champion women's full zip cardio jacket
title: fitting
review: my wingspan fingertiptofingertip length is an  longer than my height that kind of physiology is great for swimming or boxing but its terrible for wearing fullsleeve tops because regularcut apparel will end above my wrist bone its like wearing floodstyle pants on my armsthumbhole garments are an answer to this fit and fashion problem since the arm fabric is designed to be longer in order to encircle the thumb and upper part of the wrist and hand in a sort of half handglove fit with my monkeylength arms i still cant use the thumbholes without stretching the fabric but worn as a regular garment the sleeve length and wrist cuff lay long and flat  like proportional peoples  right below my wrist i also love the tapered waist the zipped pockets the high collar and the dartsaccents just above the bosom i bought two jackets  one in black and one in purple they have become my goto casual outfitnow if only i can find other casual and formal wear with this kind of design length ill be all set
